node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `vote` ( `vote_id` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `voter_user` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `weight` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `votetime` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `revotetime` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', PRIMARY KEY (`vote_id`,`voter_user`), KEY `voter_user` (`voter_user`), KEY `vote_voter_user` (`voter_user`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci PACK_KEYS=1
node.title: vote
